caption: This spot is fantastic! Fair pricing, large portions and the staff are always nice.
Good and cheap Japanese. Very good service
Really love the food from here and excellent service

Food is fantastic! I come here out of my way to pick up all the time... service in door dining is great..! Make sure you order at least 30 minutes in advance of arrival because they can be a bit slow sometimes...

I order here all the time! Amazing food and customer service. I always have an amazing experience every time I order. I recommend the california rolls and edamami. Never messy rolls, always the neatest, packed rolls. It comes with utensils, sauces, and napkins. I'd you haven't come here already, drop whatever you're doing and go to sapporo.
Good food 😊
My favorite sushi spot
We get it delivered. All. The. Time. They have such good, fresh sushi. We love it so much!
Really really good sushi
Always fresh and delicious!
The best sushi in Bay Ridge. Very friendly.
I had the avocado roll.. Loved it
Sushi is excellent and Jennifer the owner, is a wonderful person who provides great service!
Love this restaurant

This was actually my first time coming here, but won't be my last. I enjoyed the entire experience. The rolls were fresh and tasty, and the special rolls didn't disappoint in their uniqueness. I would love to try additional special rolls on future visits. Finished the visit with some mochi  green tea ice cream.

We came to this place for a meeting. This place was recommended to us by a friend.  Well, it was very successful. The staff members welcomed us with a smile and we had an excellent feeling. The food was just great. We had a great time and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Warmly recommended.

(Translated by Google) I loved this restaurant, with my friends we tried sushi and mango Kani salad, the food is of excellent quality and they provide good customer service. Highly recommended 👍  (Original) Me encantó este restaurante, con mis amigos probamos sushi y ensalada mango Kani, la comida es de excelente calidad y brindan buena atención al cliente. Muy recomendado 👍
Very freindly staff and great atmosphere. The dinner plates come with flowers and LED decorations. Highly recommend
Even though is not the best best sushi of the city is good. The service is good, reliable. The servers friendly and fare prices. Is always a good experience to go.

Amazing sushi, everything is fresh and well prepared. Worth every cent, pleaseeeee GOOO HERE EVEN FOR A BEAUTIFUL DATE. Food is amazing , I recommend mochi and the fried cheesecake for dessert. Wow, please go here it absolutely awesome. I recommend trying the fried California roll. As well as the spicy dragon roll, the besttttttt.
The amount of times I’ve come to this unique little spot and was more than just satisfied is beyond me! I love this place. Always fresh & delicious sushi.
Good, fresh food, good service, while eating outside if would have helped to have heaters that's the only suggestion.

Great customer service. They go the extra mile with the food decorations which added to the dining experience.  When we went, it was raining very hard, but they took measures to ensure we stayed dry by adding extra plastic coverings on the sides.
Top notch place with a top notch crew; I dont think I've enjoyed a sushi house more than Sapporo
Great Japanese food, with tasty rolls and frequent specials.  Friendly staff, clean environment and fair prices.
Super fresh sushi, and they are SO nice.

We have been enjoying absolutely delicious, beautifully presented dishes consistently for over 15 years (since their original location!) Their service and attention to detail is magnificent and the prices are more reasonable than you'd expect. I highly recommend this bright spot over most of the eateries along 3rd Avenue in Bay Ridge; whether a romantic dinner for two or a family style meal, the wonderful staff will graciously answer all of your questions, make excellent suggestions and fill your requests quickly, professionally in a friendly atmosphere. You must try their various wonderful drink pairings and their mouth watering desserts. Experience Sapporo once and you will return again and again just as we have!👍🏻
Great food and top notch service! Best Japanese food in Bay Ridge.
Great staff/service and excellent food.

I can’t say enough about the kind service I receive every time I go to Sapporo. The staff is lovely and so accommodating. They make dining out a delight. Not to mention how delicious the food is. The specialty rolls come at a great price and are really creative.

We went there last night -- outdoor dining due to the pandemic. We were really impressed with the high quality of the food and the excellent service. We left as very satisfied customers! Highly recommend!

My husband and I went here for his birthday dinner. We ordered the shrimp shumei for an appetizer, plum sake, and 4 rolls for the main course (2 Black Moons, 1 Lightsaber, 1 Godzilla). Everything was delicious. Sushi was fresh. Menu says Black Moon is spicy, but we'll ask for more jalapeños next time (we regularly eat ghost chilis 🔥😂). After dinner, the whole staff and owner sang Happy Birthday and brought him a free dessert for his special day. So thoughtful! We will definitely be back soon. Happy to support a sweet, local small business. Thank you for the lovely presentation and fun dinner celebration!
good service, fresh food, outdoor seating. 5 stars!
Service is excellent! I feel the sushi could be better but it's not bad, the seafood soup is very tasty and decent size. The restaurant is clean and comfortable and the prices are low.

The sashimi regular was delicious. So fresh! The way they served it was very pretty and fun. There was a little light on the plate! My daughter enjoyed her ramen noodles and they also served her apple juice in a fun way. They were very family friendly! My daughter is almost three but she can be alot. Everything came out nicely displayed and everything tasted freah and delicious.
The best!!!
High-quality Japanese food
Delicious. Clean. Great Service. Fair Prices.
Delish...  fresh fish served as well as brown rice for those who cannot eat white rice.  Beautiful, quiet atmosphere as well as great service!
AMAZING!!!
Amazing sushi place. Hosts are always friendly and attentive. Great quality sushi arranged beautifully. You feel like a family member when you show up. Highly recommended!
Friendly neighborhood place with good value.  The fried oysters are delicious! Love their pork katsu and Winter roll.
Great restaurant. Spectacular service. The food was mind blowing!
Good fish at reasonable prices!
This spot is worth a try. They have big portions for affordable prices. Always well kept and with good atmosphere. Will visit here again.
Always delicious sushi and helpful friendly staff!  Vegans in our house love veggie options especially sweet potato roll.  Soups are great too!
One of my go-to places to grab something to eat. convenient location, neat, and awesome customer service. Highly recommended!
Eye exam is quick and professional, services are friendly.  Good store.
Fantastic place highly recommend for sushi in Bay ridge.All the fish was fresh and the hot dishes work exceptional

One of the best sushi restaurants in Brooklyn and the host is the sweetest nicest person I've ever met.  A wonderful restaurant with delicious food. I recommend the chicken maki appetizer and the Black Moon special roll.
Very relaxing atmosphere. Food is very good.
Best sushi ever and service was amazing too
The staff was super nice.

Amazing in so many ways. The kindest service in town, patiently dealt with my questions and thank goodness they did otherwise I might have missed out on the amazing udon I received. Make sure you ask for the spice topping for it you won’t be disappointed!
Very nice atmosphere. It has been my favorite go-to Japanese resturaunt for the last 9 years. The owner is one of the nicest a friendliest person you may ever meet!

love, Love, LOVE this place! Their food is delicious. I’ve been taking my children here for the last ten years. Even though we’ve moved out of state, we still go back and the owners always greet us like family! Our staple restaurant when we visit Brooklyn.
Solid sushi place in the ridge.  Friendly and a nice decor
Great spot for lunch and dinner

Sake recommendations were good, the special sushi rolls were SO good...but something in the Sapporo rolls were not fresh. Two members of our party, both of whom had the rolls, felt sick after.  Otherwise, service is great and normally everything tastes good.
Constantly delicious food. The owner is so sweet and friendly! They get a little busy on holidays but usually really fast and great service.
Very good service.  Great food and amazing people.  It is where I go whenever I want Sushi!
Good service, tasty foods, fresh ingredients!

This is a place where my family and I love to go to from time to time. Great customer service, the owner is more than welcoming and the atmosphere is cozy and family oriented. From sushi to dinner platters, the food is very satisfying. If you're ever in Brooklyn, this Japenese cuisine is the place to go!
Always fresh and clean.
Good menu and reasonable price. Their staff is very friendly as well. I ordered some noodles and it wasn't bad, not traditional ramen, but still good.

Sapporo remains the best Japanese restaurant in Bay Ridge Brooklyn. The sushi has always been fresh and innovative.  The broths are delicate and well balanced, while the udon are always cooked just right. The mochi ice cream dessert is also very good.  Service, value and cleanliness are all top notch here.
Great sushi, quick service, very inexpensive. Have been there multiple times.
Very nice and friendly place! Sushi is very delicious!!! I definitely recommend this place!!!
Atmosphere nice and romantic and fun food fresh service fantastic
This is my favorite sushi and/or udon place in Brooklyn!
Great food, great service and price
Very nice place and good food! Highly recommend!
Excellent Sushi and customer service!

Had seafood soup and shrimp tempura sushi rolls. Waited a while to get soup. Soup was ok and sushi was average. Two seafood soups and two orders of sushi rolls were $22 + tip. Would like to explore more places rather than coming back here.
Cozy, serene and delicious
Very good food
Nice place, pretty good food. Sweet if somewhat inane people working here. I like the raised booths and they were sensitive about my friends gluten intolerance.
Good food good price
My favorite Brooklyn sushi place by far.
Great  service  friendly  people  good food  what more can you ask for

I have been here a few times and each time has been great. The food is delicious and the price is very reasonable. Each time I've ordered the lunch special which comes with soup or salad, rice, two California rolls, a main entree, and some wonderful fried ball of something (can't remember the name but it is very good). The staff is incredibly attentive and friendly. Each time I've been here, the owner has stopped by our table to greet us and make sure we were enjoying the meal. During the holidays, she gave us a gift bag with a bottle of sake at the end of our meal. A great neighborhood restaurant that everyone should support.
Good food
Great food, great food, great service. Thumbs up.

Big servings of pork tonkatsu and yakisoba shrimp, which were delicious, as was the seaweed salad. The gyoza was good but not quite up to par with the rest of the meal, maybe because I'm not a big fan of the sauce served with them. Awesome service, great atmosphere.

Excellent restaurant food and service . The hostess and waiters are sweet .  The place is very welcoming and the atmosphere is calming . Perfect for students studying  for exams and finishing homework too !! I recommend this place for everyone .
Great place and really cool looking food.
very good sushi!!!!!

I go here often.  Japanese fair with some vegetarian sushi options, as well as other vegetarian dishes on offer.  Very high quality, early a wait for seating, and they seem to do a brisk takeout business.  They no longer have floor seating options.
very good foot
Excellent sushi.
Excellent servive, fresh sushi.
I Love This Place So Much. Very Great Service And Great Food. I Wish I Can Give It More Than 5 Stars. Get The Bento Box. Really Good.👍👍👍❤❤❤
The food and service are always wonderful!! The owner is a beautiful person who really tries to give customers the best experience possible

I've been coming here for over a decade. Everything about this place is awesome. The sushi is always fresh and delicious. The service is friendly and timely. They make you feel like family. Definitely my number one sushi recommendation for Bay Ridge. Check them out and try the Utopia Roll. You will not be disappointed!
Love this place
Excellent atmosphere, food and service.
Friendly staff and really creative fresh sushi rolls. My fave in Bay Ridge.
Very friendly staff, great rolls.
I absolutely love Sapporo I have been coming here for over a decade and refuse to go anywhere else for Japanese food unconditionally recommend Sapporo I even bring friends from out of town here
Good sushi place, very reasonably priced, very fresh

Walk into Sapporo and youre greeted by several old school booths for the small groups with a larger dining area in the rear of the restaurant with a sunlight brightening up the space. The service is warm and makes you feel doted upon but not intrusively. The food comes quickly in succession as you complete each course so as not to feel burdened by a full table. A full selection of sake, wine and the titular beer, Sapporo of course. Having spent more money on food than rent over the years, Sapporo is a great value and the food is exceptional, as is everything else. Not only would i highly recommend Sapporo, i will definitely be returning.
One of my favorite Japanese restaurants in the neighborhood.  Food is amazing and the staff is wonderful.  The offer many promotions and discounts, so be sure to check them out.
